response.overview: Heroes, drama and moving stories - great cinema! In the 2023/24 season, the Berliner Philharmoniker will once again present three brilliant concert highlights - live on the big screen and in the best surround sound. Chief conductor Kirill Petrenko will kick off the season with a presentation of Strauss' powerful and humorous tone poem Ein Heldenleben. Star tenor Jonas Kaufmann embodies one of his parade roles in the first act of Wagner's Walk√ºre in the New Year's Eve concert. Finally, in June, Gustavo Dudamel awaits you with Mahler's multifaceted Sixth Symphony.
response.title: Berliner Philharmoniker: Silvesterkonzert 2023/24
